description_for_human: Get instant vehicle diagnostics, repair cost estimates, vehicle valuations, and maintenance advice from Wrenchli's automotive AI.
description_for_model: Use this plugin to diagnose vehicle problems, estimate repair costs, and get vehicle market valuations. For diagnostics: provide symptoms and vehicle info to get probable issues, urgency, cost estimates, and safety advice. For vehicle value: provide year, make, model, and mileage to get current market value, depreciation breakdown, and repair-vs-replace analysis. Always provide vehicle year, make, and model for accurate results.
